name: Dress Up and Makeup Games
description:
FREE for a limited time!!! Everything is UNLOCKED!!! Create your dream home and give yourself a makeover in this amazing 3-in-1 makeup, decorating and room designing game.
Style your model with new look, hairstyle, get dressed, the decorate your huge home with TONS of free items!

Loads of item to choose from, including Model, Skin Color, Hair Styles, Clothes, Shirts, Pants, Shoes,Makeup, Lipstick, Eye Color, Eyeliner, Eyeshadow, Jewelry, Necklaces, Earrings, Headbands, Sunglasses & Glasses, and tons of FREE Bonus Gifts!

Decorate your home with sofas, beds, kitchens, electronics, appliances, food, neon signs and much much more! Even cute boyfriends!

FREE BONUS GIFTS! (Look for present icon!)

Play Dress Up and Makeup Games™ FREE now!
